title: Arturo Gatti vs Micky Ward - Trilogy(HBO)(720pMkv)-desspratt-
description:
This is a x264 version of the HBO broadcast of the fights between Arturo Gatti and Micky Ward.
Does NOT include fighter entrances 
Does NOT include fighter introductions 
Includes all in between rounds 
Does NOT include post fight interviews


These three fights were captured from the recent HBO special replay in HD 1080i. They were then cropped, deinterlaced, and resized to 59.94fps 1280x720p.The display aspect ratio is 4x3. These files are level 4.1 bluray compatible, and sized to fit all three on a double layer dvd when authored to an AVCHD disc.

 The quality is not as good as an original broadcast in true HD, but the quality is better than i could get from a stand alone dvd recorder in XP mode.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
